hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Minuet of Forest#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Nayru's Love# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path of #Skulls#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of time.

hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: Boing-oing!^There are times in life when one should seek the help of others...^Thus, when standing alone fails to help, stand together.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
